subject: Throtle pedal not feeling smooth
description_text:
Hello, my throtle pedal is not feeling totaly smooth and i dont know if its
due to a setting or the dampers, can i send a video?

conversations.body_text: Okay, please send us a video clip and we shall resolve this matter for you.

I send link from google drive:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BOhKXoWMR-0PusTM8CWmoDfPqsqZ1a3J/view?usp=drivesdk

A segunda, 1/09/2025, 11:48, service@simsonn.com

Hi Osvaldo Sousa,    lubricant to the plastic moving parts of the throttle. Also, please note that our hydraulic rod is not a cheap gas spring — it is a true hydraulic structure filled with liquid. Therefore, you may hear the sound of fluid movement during operation, which is completely normal.

Thank you! I have already aplied ptfe on throtle, i think i have to mess
with some settings on the pedal, what is the recomended travel distance?

A segunda, 1/09/2025, 15:56, service@simsonn.com

Hi Osvaldo Sousa,  ​We recommend adjusting the throttle travel to 50%, then pressing the throttle to test while carefully checking if the blue limiter makes contact with the non-metallic plate of the small spring. If there is no contact, you can securely fix the blue limiter in place.

Thank you, i will try it at 50% and see how it feels!!!

A quarta, 3/09/2025, 05:34, service@simsonn.com
